LanguageData.Miho_Magma.label: cold magma
LanguageData.Miho_Magma.description: It is cold magma. It can be used as a material for ceramics or to refine iron
LanguageData.Miho_CeramicDrill.label: ceramic drill
LanguageData.Miho_CeramicDrill.description: Ceramic drill. It is weaker than a plasteel drill.
LanguageData.Miho_PlasteelDrill.label: plasteel drill
LanguageData.Miho_MechCore.label: Mechanite Replect Hive
LanguageData.Miho_MechCore.description: A Mechanite swarm, the source from which Miho's drones without artificial intelligence can execute orders.
LanguageData.Miho_DroneLeg.label: Heavy Drone Leg
LanguageData.Miho_DroneChassis.label: Heavy Drone Chassis
LanguageData.Miho_DroneArmor.label: Heavy Drone Armor
LanguageData.Miho_MechItemCleaner.label: Cleaning Drone
LanguageData.Miho_MechItemLogi.label: Logi Drone
LanguageData.Miho_MechItemLight.label: Light Battle Drone
LanguageData.Miho_MechItemHeavy.label: Heavy Battle Drone
LanguageData.Miho_MechItemSecurity.label: Guard Drone
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Shredder.label: Miho Autoshredder
LanguageData.MihoVFE_CelestialForge.label: Miho Celestial Forge
LanguageData.MihoVFE_MantleDrill.label: Miho Mantle Drill
LanguageData.MihoVFE_MantleDrill.description: It is a drilling facility that mines in a geyser to extract magma. Self-generated by the power of steam.
LanguageData.MihoVFE_DroneIndustry.label: Miho Drone Industry
LanguageData.MihoVFE_DroneIndustry.description: It is an automatic manufacturing factory for drone parts with a production rate that penetrates the sky.
LanguageData.MihoVFE_TobaccoProduction.label: Miho Tobacco Production Machine
LanguageData.MihoVFE_TobaccoProduction.description: A machine for producing tobacco from sawdust and helianto. The smoking process is a bit long.
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Hopper.label: Miho 투입기
LanguageData.MihoVFE_ShaftFurnace.label: Miho Shaft Furnace
LanguageData.MihoVFE_ShaftFurnace.description: A large furnace built for the manufacture of ceramics and steel.
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Silk.label: Ebonsilkworm nest
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Silk.description: It is an artificial nest. It is necessary to maintain a dark and high temperature state to prevent mass death.
LanguageData.MihoVFE_SmallIndustry.label: Miho Industry
LanguageData.MihoVFE_SmallIndustry.description: It is an industrial-level automatic factory.
LanguageData.Miho_DroneMaker.label: Miho Drone Workbench
LanguageData.Miho_DroneMaker.description: This is a handmade assembly workbench that decorates the end of drone production. It is equipped with high-tech parts and does not allow an assembly error of 1 nanometer.
LanguageData.MihoVEF_BeamGraphic.label: laser beam
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_Bolter.label: Miho Fastgun
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_Bolter.description: A high-penetrating rapid-fire cannon that fires 47mm rounds.
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_Bolter_Proj.label: shell
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_Rocket.label: Plasma Catapult
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_Rocket.description: An effective Catapult against heavy armor.
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_Rocket_Proj.label: plasma
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_Machinegun.label: Miho Support Machinegun
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_Machinegun.description: Medium range turret that fires 6.5mm bullets mounted on medium drones.
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_Machinegun_Proj.label: bullet
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_SapperRobot.label: Miho Demolisher
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_SapperRobot.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_Security.label: Guard Drone Gun
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_Security.description: It is a multi-purpose submachine gun that uses 8mm caliber incendiary pistol ammunition.
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_Security.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_Security.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_Minigun.label: Miho Desolator
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_Minigun.description: Whether they are wearing heavy or light armor, they will evaporate together.
LanguageData.MihoVEF_Weapon_RifleMinigun_Proj.label: plasma shot
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_BulgasalBase.label: Miho Heavy Battle Drone (Desolator) Station
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_SapsalBase.label: Miho Light Battle Drone (Catapult) Station
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_SapsalBase_LMG.label: Miho Light Battle Drone (Machinegun) Station
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_MyeongIlBase.label: Miho Command Drone Station
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_CleanerBase.label: Cleaning Drone Station
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_LogiBase.label: Logi Drone Station
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_SecurityBase.label: Guard Drone Station
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Bulgasal.label: Heavy Battle Drone (Desolator)
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Bulgasal.description: Miho Heavy industry's combat-type quadrupedal mechanoid "Bulgasal" makes it easy to drive on rough terrain. Loved everywhere.
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Bulgasal_Bolter.label: Heavy Battle Drone (Fastgun)
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Bulgasal_Bolter.descr: Miho Heavy industry's combat-type quadrupedal mechanoid "Bulgasal" makes it easy to drive on rough terrain. Loved everywhere.
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Bulgasal_Melee.label: Heavy Demolisher Drone
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Bulgasal_Melee.descri: Miho Heavy industry's combat-type quadrupedal mechanoid "Bulgasal" makes it easy to drive on rough terrain. Loved everywhere.
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Sapsal.label: Light Battle Drone (Catapult)
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Sapsal.description: Miho Heavy industry's light armored quadrupedal mechanoid "Sapsal" boasts high energy efficiency and fast movement speed.
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Sapsal.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Sapsal_LMG.label: Light Battle Drone (Machinegun)
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Sapsal_LMG.descriptio: Miho Heavy industry's light armored quadrupedal mechanoid "Sapsal" boasts high energy efficiency and fast movement speed.
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_MyeongIl.label: Command Drone
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_MyeongIl.description: Miho Heavy industry's six-legged Mechanite carrier mechanoid "Myeong-il" can take command using Persona AI. You can also release small healing mecanites to provide medical help to nearby soldiers.
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Cleaner.label: Cleaning Drone
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Cleaner.description: It is a mechanoid cleaning machine that can turn suction and wet mop at the same time. Mihos who fly hairs a lot are usually taken care of.
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Cleaner.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Logi.label: Logi Drone
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Logi.description: A medium-sized drone that transports luggage inside the settlement.
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Logi.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Security.label: Guard Drone
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Security.description: It is a two-legged security robot.
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Bulgasal_NP.label: Heavy Battle Drone
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Bulgasal_NP.descripti: Miho Heavy industry's combat-type quadrupedal mechanoid "Bulgasal" makes it easy to drive on rough terrain. Loved everywhere.
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Sapsal_NP.label: Light Battle Drone
LanguageData.MihoVFE_Mechanoids_Sapsal_NP.description: Miho Heavy industry's light armored quadrupedal mechanoid "Sapsal" boasts high energy efficiency and fast movement speed.
